 2009-04272009-03-26,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
PrecisRegulations Amending THE PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS REGULATIONS, 1985 by addressing the long term economic challenges posed by demographic change, by supporting a skilled, flexible and inclusive labour force and will work to address short term uncertainty by providing additional flexibility in work and pension arrangements to qualified older workers and their employers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0100 Publication Date: 2009-04-15
